meanings.definition: A person who brings a libel case to court.
meanings.sent1: The libellants presented their case in front of the judge.
meanings.sent2: The libellants filed a lawsuit against the newspaper for defamation.
meanings.sent3: The libellants walked confidently into the courtroom, ready to defend their reputation.
meanings.sent4: The libellants stood tall, like warriors fighting for justice in the legal battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The faces of the libellants showed determination and resolve as they sought justice.
